籤詩版本二:
Hoʻopaʻa i ka lio a paʻa i ka hahau, hele pololei mākou i ʻaneʻi, ʻo ka hapalua i ka pōʻino a ʻo ka hapa i ka pōʻino.
Me he hale lā i pau i ke ahi, ke hāʻule ka lani, lilo ka ua i lehu, aia kaʻu manaʻo.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka hapalua o ke kaumaha a me ka hapalua hauʻoli.
Pono e hana maikaʻi i nā mea a pau.
解曰: Hana ola. Mai mālama i ka pono a me ka hewa. He manawa pōkole nā ​​kaulahao. Hiki mai ka inaina.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua lanakila ʻo Tao Sanchun iā Zheng En ma Guayuan
"E ola ko'u hoomanao," ku hou mai la o Zhao Kuangyin, "Ua hoonohonoho ka Moi Beiping Zheng En i ka mare i kela manawa. "
"E ola ko'u hoomanao ana!" Ku ae la o Zhao Kuangyin a olelo mai, "Ua hoonohonoho ka Moi o Peking, Zheng En, i ka mare ia manawa. la e mare ai."
"ʻAe, ua hoʻopalau ʻia ke kaikunāne ʻekolu ma mua, pehea lā wau i ʻike ʻole ai i kēia?" Pihoihoi loa ʻo Chai Rong.
"ʻAe! Ua hoʻopalau ʻia ke kaikunāne ʻekolu ma mua, pehea lā wau i ʻike ʻole ai i kēia?" Ua kāhāhā nui ʻo Chai Rong (Emperor of the Later Zhou Dynasty).
"He moʻolelo lōʻihi ia. ʻO ka mua, ua ʻilihune mākou i kēlā manawa a ʻaʻole i komo i kou pūʻali. hilahila e haʻi aku, no laila, ʻaʻole ʻike kou mōʻī."
"He moʻolelo lōʻihi kēia. ʻO ka mua, e noho ʻilihune ana mākou i kēlā manawa a ʻaʻole i komo i kou pūʻali koa. Mai ia manawa mai, ua hakakā mākou no nā makahiki a ʻaʻohe manawa e mālama ai iā ʻoe. ʻO ka lua, ʻo ke kaikunāne ʻekolu hoʻi he hilahila iki e hai aku ia mea, no laila, ʻaʻole ʻike kou mōʻī .
"E, e mare ana ke kane haumana kula nui, heaha ka mea e hilahila ai? Ua loihi ke kaikunane ekolu ma ke kahua kaua, a ua hiki ke manaoia he meʻe lua ole.
"E! E mare ana ke keiki kulanui, heaha ka mea e hilahila ai? Ua loihi ka manawa o ke kaikunane ekolu ma ke kahua kaua, a ua hiki ke manao ia me he koa lua ole.
"Ma ka ʻōlelo ʻana, ʻaʻole hiki iaʻu ke hoʻohewa i koʻu kaikunāne ʻekolu no ka hilahila, no ka mea, ua hoʻopaʻa ʻia kēia male."
"Ma ka ʻōlelo ʻana, ʻaʻole hiki iaʻu ke hoʻohewa i koʻu kaikunāne ʻekolu no ka hilahila, no ka mea, ua hoʻopaʻa ʻia kēia male."
"Papaʻi ʻia? ʻAe, hoihoi. E ʻoluʻolu e haʻi mai iaʻu i ka mea i hana ʻia."
"Ua paʻi au! ʻEā! He hoihoi! E ʻoluʻolu e haʻi mai iaʻu i ka mea i hana ʻia."
"Ae, ke hoomanao nei au i kela makahiki, i ko makou kokoke ana e hui me ka Moi, e kaalo ana makou ma ke Kalana o Baocheng. He wela loa i ka mahina o Iune. Aole hiki i ko'u kaikunane ekolu ke noho ma ka hotele, nolaila hele aku la oia e auwana hookahi. Ma hope o ka hala ʻana i kahi māla melon, komo ʻo ia i loko e ʻohi, hoʻopau nā meloni i ka make wai, ʻaʻohe nui o nā meloni i oʻo mua i kēia manawa, a ʻaʻole ʻike ke kolu o ke kaikunāne i ke ʻohi ʻana, no laila ua haki nui ʻo ia. He wahine ka mea nana i na meloni, hele aku la oia imua e hoohewa i ke kolu o ke kaikunane, he kue ko laua, alaila hoomaka laua e hakaka, e hele mai. ."
"Ae, ke hoomanao nei au i kela makahiki, i ko makou kokoke ana e hui me ka Moi, e kaalo ana makou ma ke Kalana o Baocheng. He wela loa i ka mahina o Iune. Aole hiki i ko'u kaikunane ekolu ke noho ma ka hotele, nolaila hele aku la oia e auwana hookahi. Ma hope o ka hala ʻana i kahi māla melon, komo ʻo ia i loko e ʻohi, hoʻopau nā meloni i ka make wai, ʻaʻohe nui o nā meloni i oʻo mua i kēia manawa, a ʻaʻole ʻike ke kolu o ke kaikunāne i ke ʻohi ʻana, no laila ua haki nui ʻo ia. He wahine ka mea nana i na meloni, hele aku la oia imua e hoohewa i ke kolu o ke kaikunane, he kue ko laua, alaila hoomaka laua e hakaka, e hele mai. ."
"ʻO kēia Zheng Ziming, ʻo ia ka hewa ma ka mua, pono ʻo ia e kala mai. No ke aha ʻoe e hahau ai iā ia? Eia kekahi, pehea lā e hiki ai i ka ʻohana o ke kaikamahine ke pale aku i nā kuʻi a me nā kiʻi ʻana o kahi kanaka ʻino e like me ia! E hele mai, e hahau ʻoe i ke kaikamahine ʻAʻole?" "ʻAʻole i pōʻino ke kaikamahine..."
" ʻO kēia Zheng Ziming, ʻo ia ka hewa ma mua, no laila pono ʻo ia e kala mai. No ke aha ʻoe e hahau nei iā ia? Eia kekahi, pehea lā e hiki ai i ka ʻohana o ke kaikamahine ke pale aku i nā kuʻi a me nā kiʻi ʻana a ke kanaka ʻino e like me ia! E hele mai, e haʻi mai iaʻu. hahau oe i keia kaikamahine. Aole?"
"ʻAʻole i pōʻino ke kaikamahine..."
"Ua maikaʻi, ua maikaʻi... ʻAe, ʻaʻole anei ʻoe i hana? ʻAe, manaʻo wau ua hoʻopakele ʻoe iaʻu i ka manawa."
"Ua maikaʻi! Ua maikaʻi... ʻEā! ʻAʻole anei ʻoe i hana? ʻŌ! Manaʻo wau ʻo ʻoe ka mea nāna au i hoʻopakele i ka manawa!"
"...ʻAʻole, ʻo ka mea aʻu i hoʻopakele ai ʻo ia ... ke kolu o ke kaikunāne." "...ʻAʻole, ʻo ka mea aʻu i hoʻopakele ai ʻo ia ... ke kolu o ke kaikunāne."
"Ah?!" "Ah?!"
"Ua kiʻi ʻia ke kaikunāne ʻekolu e ka wahine i ka honua a ua hahau ʻia ʻo ia a puni. "
"Ua kikeke ʻia ke kaikunāne ʻekolu e ka wahine a hahau ʻino ʻia. ʻO ka mea pōmaikaʻi, ua hōʻea au a koi aku iā ia e haʻalele, no laila ʻaʻole ʻo ia i ʻeha nui. ... Kou Alii... Kou Alii!..."
"Ah?...O, owai kela wahine!?" "A!?...O, owai kela wahine!?"
"Ma hope mai o koʻu ʻike ʻana ʻo Tao Sanchun ka inoa o ka wahine, a ʻo kona makuakāne ʻo Tao Hong he meʻe kahiko ʻaʻohe manaʻo. Ua aʻo ʻo Tao Sanchun i ka ʻoihana kaua mai kona makuakāne mai kona wā kamaliʻi. kona ohana, ua ike au he ano oi loa ko Miss Sanchun. , o Luo Luo a me ka lokomaikai, me ka maa ole o ka noho ana he kaikamahine liilii, ua hoolikelike lakou me ia. Ua makemake no hoi ka makuakane a me ke kaikamahine Tao i ke ano pololei o ke kolu o ke kaikunane. paʻi koke a hoʻoholo i kēia male ʻana no lāua.
"Mahope mai o ko'u ike ana, o Tao Sanchun ka inoa o ua kaikamahine nei, a ua a'o oia i ka oihana kaua mai kona makuakane mai, mai kona wa kamalii mai. Mahope iho o ko'u kamaaina ana me kona ohana, ua ike au he ano maikai loa ko Miss Sanchun. lokomaikaʻi, a ʻaʻohe ona ʻike o ke ʻano o ke kaikamahine liʻiliʻi, no laila, ua ʻimi au iā ia, ua makemake nui ʻo Mr. Tao a me kāna kaikamahine i ke ʻano pololei o ko lāua kaikunāne ʻekolu, ua hoʻopaʻa koke lāua a hoʻoholo e mare kekahi i kekahi. E ka Moi, aole anei oe i manao he mare hoopunipuni keia?"
(He mea hoʻohālike kēia moʻolelo, no ka mea, ua lilo ka mea ʻino i mea maikaʻi.)
聖意: E pule no ka palekana o ka home a me oe iho, e akahele, e pule no ka waiwai, e hoopau i ka oihana, e keakea i ka mare, e hoopa'i, e Liujia, e 'inikua, na hele wāwae i paʻa i loko o ka mahinaʻai, e hoʻopōʻino i ka enuhe silika, ka pōʻino holoholona, ​​nā poʻe nalo, nā hoʻopiʻi kānāwai, nā poho, neʻe, conservativeness. , waiwai lilo, mai ino, hopohopo, pilikia, mauna, luakupapau, hemahema
古人: Ua lanakila ʻo Tao Sanchun iā Zheng En ma ka māla melon
